content.webTitle: Best pictures of the day - live

fields.headline: Best pictures of the day - live
fields.bodyText: Today our man at the Old Bailey, Felix Clay, has sent us an Instagram of the media waiting outside court during the phone-hacking trial. Here's our Halloween-themed sport picture of the day... Eyewitness clear view: The city of Vancouver is shrouded in low-lying fog while its skyscrapers bask in a warm sunny atmosphere.
